articles.title: Carlos Simms
articles.contents:
MyPORTFOLIO

              Carlos Simms
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            
            Biography
            First-generation alumnus from The University of Idaho and an ex-Ronald E. McNair Achievement scholar. Academic accreditation includes a Bachelor of Science in Environmental Science and an Academic Certificate in Climate Change. Pursuing a Master of Science in Environmental Science and Management at The University of California Santa Barbara; Specializing in energy and climate studies. Aspire to work in the public sector in energy and climate work, notably paving the way for a future that considers renewable energy, climate responsibility, and Global South equity.
            
            
            Contact
            
            Carlos M. Simms
            
            
            Master’s Student
            
            
            University of California Santa Barbara
            
            
            Bren School of Environmental Science and Management
            
            
            csimms@ucsb.edu
            
            
            carlossimms15@gmail.com
